ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras:  6*Bullet Cameras,1/3" SONY Exview HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 131 ft IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu.;; 6*Dome Cameras, 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98.4 ft IR Distance, Vandalproof, WDR (Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu.
16 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time, 4CH D1 + 12CH CIF Recroding, 16 CH Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time Recording 16CH Playback, 12 Cameras (6 Dome & 6 Bullet) 700 TV Lines, iPhone Android Viewable
